name: Esquire Escape
description:
Esquire Escape is an endless runner, similar to the likes of Temple Run and Minion Dash.

However it was made in 43 hours in a Game Jam over the course of a weekend by a team of 4 students.

Enjoy and go get that high score

TEAM

Caleb Appleby - Programmer

Dylan Wainman - Designer

Matt Vivian - Artist

Samantha Handley - Artist
